title: CVE20188440
extract: A vulnerability in the Advanced Local Procedure Call (ALPC) used in Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to elevate privileges on a targeted system. ... An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by accessing the system and executing an application that submits malicious input to the affected software.Sep 11, 2018
extract_html: A vulnerability in the Advanced Local Procedure Call (ALPC) used in Microsoft Windows could allow a local attacker to elevate privileges on a targeted system. ... An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by accessing the system and executing an application that submits malicious input to the affected software.Sep 11, 2018
